displaymaker: after Perino del Vaga (Pietro Buonaccorsi), Italian, 1501–1547 | formerly attributed to John Wollaston, British, fl. 1734–67, active in the United States
caption: After Perino del Vaga (Pietro Buonaccorsi) (Italian, 1501–1547), formerly attributed to John Wollaston (British, fl. 1734–67, active in the United States), Recto and verso: sketches of legs, a bearded head, a horse's head, birds, vases, and active and reclining figures. Grey and dark brown ink; 16.4 x 11.7 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1947-179)
captionhtml: After Perino del Vaga (Pietro Buonaccorsi) (Italian, 1501–1547), formerly attributed to John Wollaston (British, fl. 1734–67, active in the United States), Recto and verso: sketches of legs, a bearded head, a horse's head, birds, vases, and active and reclining figures. Grey and dark brown ink; 16.4 x 11.7 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1947-179)
